divs: Sighting Detailswow I never thought id tell this story because i thought i was maybe seeing some kind of millitary craft being so close to bases and all.I live near dobbins AFB.well i was watching H2 AND freaked when i saw the episode in england with the triangle shapped UFO in the woods and then they got a picture of it.wow i freaked .OK hear it is. I saw the same one .i no for a fact.i was in norcross at a storage unit when i just happend to look up and see a bright light like someones welding torch. it lasted about ten seconds.then a super bright white vapor trail popped out of the bright light.the vapor trail was as wide as the BLACK TRIANGLE that came out of the vapor trail.the vapor trail disapated as fast as it appeared.out shoots this black triangle with a white yellow light in each corner of the craft with this reddish mesh like light in the middle.the lights were very dim because i figgured it just came throgh the stratisphere.it was way up there.so the thing had to be huge.AFTER IT CAME OUT OF THE VAPOR TRaIL.it shot across the sky so fast and silent it was gone in about 2 seconds.just how big i dont no but im guessing 300 ft or more.I NO WHAT I SAW .i dont see things i got 20 12 vision.i no the differnce between ufo and aircraft spent whole life around aircraft.all i got to say is not a day goes by that i dont think about what i and many others just like me have seen.the possibillites are endless.after seeing those pictures ive been lost .need some answers WOW this has really ben messing with my head you no .TY YALL KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK
